["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debianubuntu-用户","children":"Debian/Ubuntu 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["请注意：官方提供的软件列表可能经常变化，镜像站不保证能提供所有系统与软件的组合。
请在",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.erlang-solutions.com/downloads/","rel":"nofollow","children":"官网"}],"查询目前的可用版本，并根据实际情况指定版本。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先信任 erlang-solutions 的 GPG 公钥："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}mkdir -m 0755 -p /etc/apt/keyrings/
curl -s https://binaries2.erlang-solutions.com/GPG-KEY-pmanager.asc | {{sudo}}gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/erlang-solutions-archive_compat.gpg","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/erlang-solutions.list"}],"，填入下列内容（可根据需要选择）："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/erlang-solutions.list","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian 11",{"os_name":"debian","release_name":"bullseye"}],["Ubuntu 22.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"jammy"}],["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"bionic"}]]},{"title":"Mongoose IM 版本","items":[["MongooseIM 5",{"mongooseim_version":"mongooseim-5"}],["MongooseIM 4",{"mongooseim_version":"mongooseim-4"}]]},{"title":"Erlang/OTP 版本","items":[["Erlang/OTP 24",{"erlang_version":"esl-erlang-24"}],["Erlang/OTP 25",{"erlang_version":"esl-erlang-25"}],["Erlang/OTP 26",{"erlang_version":"esl-erlang-26"}]]},{"title":"Elixir 版本","items":[["Elixir 1.14",{"elixir_version":"elixir-1.14"}],["Elixir 1.15",{"elixir_version":"elixir-1.15"}]]}],"code":"deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/erlang-solutions-archive_compat.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{os_name}} {{release_name}}-esl-erlang-{{erlang_version}} contrib
deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/erlang-solutions-archive_compat.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{os_name}} {{release_name}}-elixir-{{elixir_version}} contrib
deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/erlang-solutions-archive_compat.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{os_name}} {{release_name}}-mongooseim-{{mongooseim_version}} contrib","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["安装 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"esl-erlang"}]," 等软件包即可："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-get update
{{sudo}}apt-get install -y elixir esl-erlang mongooseim","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"centos--rocky-linux-用户","children":"CentOS / Rocky Linux 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["官方目前没有提供软件仓库，请前往",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.erlang-solutions.com/downloads/","rel":"nofollow","children":"官网"}],"下载。"]}],"
"]}]

meta.title: Erlang Solutions 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
